document.full_text: a federal judge refused to rule on a request from former gov. rod r. blagojevich to cancel his retrial on political corruption charges, saying the motion did not appear to be serious and would die of its own accord.
document.title: midwest: illinois: judge rebuffs request to cancel blagojevich retrial
lines_and_colors: a federal judge refused to rule on a request from former gov. rod r. blagojevich to cancel his retrial on political corruption charges, saying the motion did not appear to be serious and would die of its own accord.
